transcript: I was waiting for you, Chris, till then you never wrote and then when you did, what did you say? I mean you sure can't be ambiguous, you know?

segments.text: I was waiting for you, Chris, till then you never wrote and then when you did, what did you say?
I mean you sure can't be ambiguous, you know?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I was waiting for you, Chris.  Till then you never wrote and then when you did what did you say.  I mean you sure can be ambiguous you know.
